original_title: The Boy Who Sees The World Upside Down
overview: With remarkable insight into the human condition, join 13 year old Mahendra Ahirwar who suffers from a rare condition that makes his head hang from his body in a 180 degree angle. Unable to stand or walk by himself, Mahendra sees the world upside down and longs to be able to see things as his brothers and sisters do.
title: The Boy Who Sees The World Upside Down
